fields.name: CommunityGalleryImageId
fields.description: A relative uri containing a community Azure Compute Gallery image reference.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: A relative uri containing either a Platform Image Repository, user image, or Azure Compute Gallery image reference.

fields.name: Lun
fields.description: If the disk is created from an image's data disk, this is an index that indicates which of the data disks in the image to use. For OS disks, this field is null.

fields.name: SharedGalleryImageId
fields.description: A relative uri containing a direct shared Azure Compute Gallery image reference.
